item.title: ruby contracts
item.description:
Recently I tested https://github.com/egonSchiele/contracts.ruby types assertions for ruby as I prefer executable documentation and it’s quite expressive and works correctly.

The only problem I have is that for complex hashes error is unreadable so I’ve created issue with enhancement proposal how to fix it. Unfortunatelly project is not maintained anymore, so I will have to write this patch alone probably :)

Anyway I recommend it.
